name: CICADS 3301
description:
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
Here come your hour! You hid in your bunker for five years, after the epidemic. The time has come to get out of it and find the supplies that have come to an end! You only have a knife. Search for supplies, raise and improve your weapon, SURVIVE !!!
The game has 7 levels. At each level, 7 days of play. In order to move to another level, you must complete QUESTS within 7 days. They can be 1 or 2 (depending on the difficulty level). The purpose of the tasks is very simple: kill the n-zombies, save the surviving people and save yourself.
To exit the level in the menu - the [ESC] key

So. In the game there are pumping, pumping lasts a few seconds (depending on the weapon being pumped). To upgrade weapons you must have 3 units. this weapon. For example, in order to pump a pistol, you will have to give 3 ordinary pistols and get 1 improved. Only 2 parameters are pumped through: URON and RECALL. For gun and machine gun har-ki completely different. Very important in the game is - ammo. After all, without them, you can not use all the mechanics of the game. You can not shoot and beat at a distance. But it does not matter. This is what the game provides for COLD WEAPONS - A KNIFE OR A MACHETE (whatever you like). It has advantages as well (minimal recharge and always with it), as well as minuses (melee attack, damage).

Combine a knife, a pistol, a machine gun for a tactical game and a battle against carnivorous ZOMBIES. It is at your hands the salvation of mankind.
Just as I said there are STARS. It depends on them, your speed and personal har-ki. Stars are earned for successfully completing levels. When you reach a large number of stars, instead of weapons, you can change the look of your character and become a legendary survivor.) Stars are displayed in the main game menu.
At the end of the game you will meet with BOSS. Huge, furious ZOMBIES. So gain patience and endurance and fight back.

The setting - is your body. the game - is your salvation, and the victory - is liberation. You are a symbiotic flora, must last 7 days without meat-rot and save your friendly cells from nasty pathogens

Features:
- achievements;
- nice graphics;
- simple operation;
- interesting gameplay;
- unforgettable adventures;
- can you last 7 days without rot?

Online and offline interaction, all within our real world.
Is this a game or something really serious?
